briefTitle: Comparison of Synthetic Mammography Versus Full-Field Digital Mammography in Image Interpretation and Performance Metrics
officialTitle: Comparison of Synthetic Mammography Versus Full-Field Digital Mammography in Image Interpretation and Performance Metrics
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To analyze the impact of synthetic mammography (SM), as compared with full-field digital mammography (FFDM
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female
* Age 18 or older
* Consecutive cases in breast imaging center

Exclusion Criteria:

* Cases demonstrate administrative or technical errors (e.g. missing views, labeling inconsistent with report, etc.)
